bibl.title: Letter from Albert E. Truby to Philip Showalter Hench, December 26, 1952

div1.p: Truby appreciates the photos of the plaques, park, and Building No. 1 that Hench sent after attending the ceremonies in Cuba.

div1.head: Letter from Albert E. Truby to Philip Showalter Hench, December 26, 1952

opener.dateline:
ALBERT E. TRUBY
145 LAUREL STREET
SAN FRANCISCO 18. CALIFORNIA
Dec. 26 / 52

div1.p:
The photo's of the old & new “caseta,”
those of the bronze plaques and the wall in
in the little park on which they have been
placed (with the names which identify them); also
the bronze tablets of the volunteers and those
who cooperated, came Christmas morning. What a
wonderful surprise and what a very pleasing
begining of your early efforts to preserve something
of the camp Lazear for history- With this fine
start you can probably induce the Cubans to
follow your guiding hand in future developments
of the little park. Dr. Nogueira, too, has done more
too, in guiding the work has done than I
expected, with the opposition he had to contend
with. I will write him soon, What does he want in a Photo?

I had seen nothing about the dedication
on Dec. 3 until your pictures came- May I keep
some of them. I will be glad to reimburse you for
them, I appreciate them very much, I think you
should write up the story of the camp and the little
building in Hygeia like your first one on Y. F.
Please tell me a little about it the dedication,
who was there etc. when you have time.

I will write to the proper head of the Cuban sanitary
department and thank them for their courtesy to me
and for my appreciation of having my name honored
by being included with those (others) who cooperated
in the work done at Camp Lazear.

I hope you were able to explain how
I answered my first invitation to the dedication
promptly, but failed to get a reply to the
new director of health promptly because of
postal difficulties, which were unexpected- I think
that you probably could explain it to the
Cuban authorities.

Hope that you and your fine family had a
happy Christmas. We are all fine and had a
grand xmas..

With the best of new year's greetings
for you and yours
